effect.diamond_pearl: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.platinum: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.platinum: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The foe is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
